price: Kandi itegeko ryacu ni (ijambo) rimwe; (ryihuta) nko guhumbya no guhumbura.
arabic: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā amrunā illā wāḥidatun kalamḥin bil-baṣari
